lead_paragraph: Three suicide bombers disguised in military uniforms infiltrated a mausoleum, the Iraqi authorities said, killing at least 36 people and wounding 40.

headline.print_headline: Dozens Killed in Suicide Attack on Shiite Shrine in Iraq
headline.main: Dozens Killed in Suicide Attack on Shiite Shrine North of Baghdad

snippet: Three suicide bombers disguised in military uniforms infiltrated a mausoleum, the Iraqi authorities said, killing at least 36 people and wounding 40....
abstract: Three suicide bombers kill 36 people in attack on Shiite shrine north of Baghdad; attack comes days after Islamic State bombing in central Baghdad that killed 250 people.
